languages.text: "Разумеется, Лорд-капитан. Если желаете — неделя на корабле прошла с рекордно низким показателем мелких нарушений порядка на нижних палубах. Младший обер-техномат из восьмой смены составил новый рецепт смазки для имплантов кухонных сервиторов. Интендант одиннадцатого складочного сектора недавно отчитался, что мы расходуем торжественное убранство на двадцать процентов медленнее ожидаемого. То есть ковров, скатертей и светильников для торжественных приемов хватит еще на пятнадцать лет вместо ожидаемых десяти. Даже с учетом выгорания части склада во время атаки культистов!"

traits.locale_text: "Разумеется, Лорд-капитан. Если желаете — неделя на корабле прошла с рекордно низким показателем мелких нарушений порядка на нижних палубах. Младший обер-техномат из восьмой смены составил новый рецепт смазки для имплантов кухонных сервиторов. Интендант одиннадцатого складочного сектора недавно отчитался, что мы расходуем торжественное убранство на двадцать процентов медленнее ожидаемого. То есть ковров, скатертей и светильников для торжественных приемов хватит еще на пятнадцать лет вместо ожидаемых десяти. Даже с учетом выгорания части склада во время атаки культистов!"

languages.text: "Certainly, Lord Captain. If you are interested, this week passed with a record low rate of minor disturbances on the lower decks. A senior technomat from shift eight came up with a new formula for a lubricant used in kitchen servitor implant maintenance. The quartermaster of store compartment eleven reported recently that we are spending ceremonial decorations at least twenty percent slower than expected, which means we have enough tablecloths, carpets, and lamps to last us fifteen years of grand receptions instead of ten. Even considering that some of the stock was burned during the cultist attack on the vessel!"

Интендант одиннадцатого складочного сектора недавно отчитался, что мы расходуем торжественное убранство на двадцать процентов медленнее ожидаемого. languages.text: « Si vous y tenez, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Vous serez {mf|heureux|heureuse} d'apprendre que cette semaine, nous avons enregistré le plus faible nombre d'incidents mineurs sur les ponts inférieurs à ce jour. Un technomate confirmé de l'équipe numéro huit a mis au point une nouvelle formule de lubrifiant pour la maintenance interne des servitors de cuisine. Dans son dernier rapport, le quartier-maître de la réserve numéro onze a signalé que notre consommation d'articles de cérémonie était inférieure d'au moins vingt pour cent aux valeurs attendues, ce qui signifie que nous avons suffisamment de nappes, de tapis et de lampes pour non pas dix, mais quinze années de réceptions fastueuses. Et le calcul tient compte des pertes suite à l'incendie provoqué par l'attaque des fanatiques ! »
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Lord Captain. If you are interested, this week passed with a record low rate of minor disturbances on the lower decks. A senior technomat from shift eight came up with a new formula for a lubricant used in kitchen servitor implant maintenance. The quartermaster of store compartment eleven reported recently that we are spending ceremonial decorations at least twenty percent slower than expected, which means we have enough tablecloths, carpets, and lamps to last us fifteen years of grand receptions instead of ten. Even considering that some of the stock was burned during the cultist attack on the vessel!"

traits.locale_text: « Si vous y tenez, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Vous serez {mf|heureux|heureuse} d'apprendre que cette semaine, nous avons enregistré le plus faible nombre d'incidents mineurs sur les ponts inférieurs à ce jour. Un technomate confirmé de l'équipe numéro huit a mis au point une nouvelle formule de lubrifiant pour la maintenance interne des servitors de cuisine. Dans son dernier rapport, le quartier-maître de la réserve numéro onze a signalé que notre consommation d'articles de cérémonie était inférieure d'au moins vingt pour cent aux valeurs attendues, ce qui signifie que nous avons suffisamment de nappes, de tapis et de lampes pour non pas dix, mais quinze années de réceptions fastueuses. Et le calcul tient compte des pertes suite à l'incendie provoqué par l'attaque des fanatiques ! »

languages.text: "Natürlich, Lord Captain. Falls es Euch interessiert, es gab in dieser Woche so wenige Zwischenfälle auf den Unterdecks wie noch nie. Ein leitender Technomat aus Schicht 8 hat einen neuen Schmierstoff entwickelt, der bei der Wartung der Implantate von Küchenservitoren eingesetzt wird. Der Quartiermeister von Lagerabteil 11 hat kürzlich berichtet, dass wir zeremonielle Dekorationen mindestens zwanzig Prozent langsamer verbrauchen als prognostiziert. Wir haben also genügend Tischdecken, Teppiche und Lampen für große Empfänge in fünfzehn Jahren statt in nur zehn. Und das, obwohl ein Teil des Inventars während des Kultistenangriffs auf das Schiffs verbrannt ist!"
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Lord Captain. If you are interested, this week passed with a record low rate of minor disturbances on the lower decks. A senior technomat from shift eight came up with a new formula for a lubricant used in kitchen servitor implant maintenance. The quartermaster of store compartment eleven reported recently that we are spending ceremonial decorations at least twenty percent slower than expected, which means we have enough tablecloths, carpets, and lamps to last us fifteen years of grand receptions instead of ten. Even considering that some of the stock was burned during the cultist attack on the vessel!"

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich, Lord Captain. Falls es Euch interessiert, es gab in dieser Woche so wenige Zwischenfälle auf den Unterdecks wie noch nie. Ein leitender Technomat aus Schicht 8 hat einen neuen Schmierstoff entwickelt, der bei der Wartung der Implantate von Küchenservitoren eingesetzt wird. Der Quartiermeister von Lagerabteil 11 hat kürzlich berichtet, dass wir zeremonielle Dekorationen mindestens zwanzig Prozent langsamer verbrauchen als prognostiziert. Wir haben also genügend Tischdecken, Teppiche und Lampen für große Empfänge in fünfzehn Jahren statt in nur zehn. Und das, obwohl ein Teil des Inventars während des Kultistenangriffs auf das Schiffs verbrannt ist!"

languages.text: «Naturalmente, Lord Capitán. Si le interesa, esta semana ha habido un índice inusualmente bajo de disturbios menores en las cubiertas inferiores. Un tecnómata senior del turno ocho ideó una nueva fórmula para un lubricante utilizado en el mantenimiento de implantes de servidores de cocinas. El intendente del compartimento de almacenamiento once acaba de informar de que estamos usando decoraciones ceremoniales al menos un veinte por ciento más lento de lo esperado, lo que significa que tenemos suficientes manteles, alfombras y lámparas para quince años de grandes banquetes en lugar de diez. ¡Incluso teniendo en cuenta el material que ardió cuando los cultistas atacaron la nave!».
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Lord Captain. If you are interested, this week passed with a record low rate of minor disturbances on the lower decks. A senior technomat from shift eight came up with a new formula for a lubricant used in kitchen servitor implant maintenance. The quartermaster of store compartment eleven reported recently that we are spending ceremonial decorations at least twenty percent slower than expected, which means we have enough tablecloths, carpets, and lamps to last us fifteen years of grand receptions instead of ten. Even considering that some of the stock was burned during the cultist attack on the vessel!"

traits.locale_text: «Naturalmente, Lord Capitán. Si le interesa, esta semana ha habido un índice inusualmente bajo de disturbios menores en las cubiertas inferiores. Un tecnómata senior del turno ocho ideó una nueva fórmula para un lubricante utilizado en el mantenimiento de implantes de servidores de cocinas. El intendente del compartimento de almacenamiento once acaba de informar de que estamos usando decoraciones ceremoniales al menos un veinte por ciento más lento de lo esperado, lo que significa que tenemos suficientes manteles, alfombras y lámparas para quince años de grandes banquetes en lugar de diez. ¡Incluso teniendo en cuenta el material que ardió cuando los cultistas atacaron la nave!».

languages.text: “遵命，舰长大人。我们确实有好消息，如果您有兴趣了解的话。本周底层甲板发生的骚乱创下了历史新低。第八分区的某位高阶技工发明了新的配方，可以用来润滑厨房机仆的植入物。第十一分区库房的军需官最近报告说，我们的礼仪装饰的支出速度比预期至少慢了百分之二十，这意味着我们库存的桌布、地毯与灯具足够未来十五年所有的盛大招待会使用。即便部分库存在邪教徒袭击飞船的时候被烧毁了，这批库存的数量也比当初预计的十年要更久！”
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Lord Captain. If you are interested, this week passed with a record low rate of minor disturbances on the lower decks. A senior technomat from shift eight came up with a new formula for a lubricant used in kitchen servitor implant maintenance. The quartermaster of store compartment eleven reported recently that we are spending ceremonial decorations at least twenty percent slower than expected, which means we have enough tablecloths, carpets, and lamps to last us fifteen years of grand receptions instead of ten. Even considering that some of the stock was burned during the cultist attack on the vessel!"

traits.locale_text: “遵命，舰长大人。我们确实有好消息，如果您有兴趣了解的话。本周底层甲板发生的骚乱创下了历史新低。第八分区的某位高阶技工发明了新的配方，可以用来润滑厨房奴工的植入物。第十一分区库房的军需官最近报告说，我们的礼仪装饰的支出速度比预期至少慢了百分之二十，这意味着我们库存的桌布、地毯与灯具足够未来十五年所有的盛大招待会使用。即便部分库存在邪教徒袭击飞船的时候被烧毁了，这批库存的数量也比当初预计的十年要更久！”

languages.text: 「もちろんです、ロード・キャプテン。ご興味がおありでしたら、報告をお伝えいたします。下層デッキの小競り合いが記録的に低い頻度で今週を過ごせました。第8シフト の上級テクノマットが、調理サーヴィターのインプラントのメンテナンスに使う潤滑剤の新しい配合を考案しました。店舗区画11番の補給係から最近報告があったのですが、儀式用の装飾品にかかる費用の消費速度が予想より最低でも20パーセント遅いというのです。つまり我々は、盛大な会を開いても今後10年どころか15年分ものテーブルクロス、カーペット、照明を保有していることになります。教団に船を襲撃されて、いくらか在庫が焼かれてしまったのにですよ！」
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Lord Captain. If you are interested, this week passed with a record low rate of minor disturbances on the lower decks. A senior technomat from shift eight came up with a new formula for a lubricant used in kitchen servitor implant maintenance. The quartermaster of store compartment eleven reported recently that we are spending ceremonial decorations at least twenty percent slower than expected, which means we have enough tablecloths, carpets, and lamps to last us fifteen years of grand receptions instead of ten. Even considering that some of the stock was burned during the cultist attack on the vessel!"

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんです、ロード・キャプテン。ご興味がおありでしたら、報告をお伝えいたします。下層デッキの小競り合いが記録的に低い頻度で今週を過ごせました。第8シフト の上級テクノマットが、調理サーヴィターのインプラントのメンテナンスに使う潤滑剤の新しい配合を考案しました。店舗区画11番の補給係から最近報告があったのですが、儀式用の装飾品にかかる費用の消費速度が予想より最低でも20パーセント遅いというのです。つまり我々は、盛大な会を開いても今後10年どころか15年分ものテーブルクロス、カーペット、照明を保有していることになります。教団に船を襲撃されて、いくらか在庫が焼かれてしまったのにですよ！」

languages.text: "Elbette Lord Kaptan. İlginizi çekerse bu hafta alt güvertelerdeki küçük çaplı kargaşaların oranı, rekor düzeyde düşüktü. Sekizinci vardiyadan tecrübeli bir teknomat, mutfak hizmetörü implant bakımında kullanılan yağ için yeni bir formül geliştirdi. On birinci depolama kompartımanının levazım subayı, son zamanlardaki tören dekorasyonu kullanımının beklenenden en az yüzde yirmi daha az olduğunu, dolayısıyla da düzenlenecek büyük resepsiyonlarda masa örtülerinin, perdelerin ve lambaların on yıl değil de on beş yıl boyunca bize yeteceğini beklediğini raporladı. Üstelik stokların bir kısmı, gemide gerçekleşen tarikatçı saldırısı sırasında yandı!"
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Lord Captain. If you are interested, this week passed with a record low rate of minor disturbances on the lower decks. A senior technomat from shift eight came up with a new formula for a lubricant used in kitchen servitor implant maintenance. The quartermaster of store compartment eleven reported recently that we are spending ceremonial decorations at least twenty percent slower than expected, which means we have enough tablecloths, carpets, and lamps to last us fifteen years of grand receptions instead of ten. Even considering that some of the stock was burned during the cultist attack on the vessel!"
